ComicInfo.Characters: Bode Locke,Ellie Whedon (flashback),Kinsey Locke,Kim Topher (dies in flashback),Dodge [Lucas Caravaggio] (also in flashback),Rendell Locke (flashback),Mark Cho (dies in flashback),Duncan Locke (flashback),Erin Voss (flashback),Tyler Locke
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T00:58:32 [Issue ID 4000-336434] urn:comicvine:4000-336434 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:35:04. [Issue ID 944792]
ComicInfo.Summary: As a storm thunders up the coast to Lovecraft, Massachusetts, the Keepers of the Keys face Dodge a final time, under three hundred feet of stone, in the darkness before the Black Door. Here, water will mix with blood and The Drowning Cave will become a colossal grave, in the final issue of the CLOCKWORKS storyline.
ComicInfo.Title: Curtain
